'''1.12-pre5'''<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-112-pre-release-3|Minecraft 1.12 Pre-Release 5}}</ref> is the fifth pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.12]].

== Changes ==
'''[[Advancement]]s'''
* All recipe unlock advancements now have a parent of <code>minecraft:recipes/root</code>.
* Some recipe unlock advancements were renamed.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.12 Pre-Release 5|prefix=Minecraft
|;dev
|115291|Text-to-Speech doesn't follow English's grammatical rules... (Instead of saying {Player} says {Text}, it just says {Player} {Text.})
|116961|Tamed parrots still eat seeds.
|117625|Executes with relative coordinates in functions doesn't work properly.
|117626|Cannot use right click to place items in crafting grid after clicking recipe in recipe book while holding an item.
|117628|Ladders can't be placed above each other/drop when receiving block update.
|117631|Feeding seeds to tamed parrots additionally makes them sit down / stand up.
|117638|Ladders only go on adjacent block.
|117643|Feeding parrot a cookie does not count as killing.
|117667|Can't feed cookies to tamed parrots.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* 1.12-pre5 was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
* This version came out exactly 8 years after [[Java Edition Classic 0.0.12a|Classic 0.0.12a]].
